directions: Place the chicken, smoked sausage, pork sausage and onions into a large pot. Fill with enough water to cover them all by 3 inches. Season with a little salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, cover and cook for 1 hour. Stir in the rice, and turn off heat. Let stand covered for 5 minutes to cook the rice.
ingredients: 2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into chunks
1 pound smoked beef sausage, cut into chunks
title: Chicken Bogg
